<p>Merci d'avoir pris le temps de nous f:
Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback!

<1>It is important for {{productName}}. We will try to do better in the future!

Thank you for taking the time to write this feedback:

it is important to us!
<strong>Contribution de code</strong> :: Contribute through code: we've built {{productName}} in an open state of mind. For instance, some of our algorithms have been co-developed with other organizations, such as Etalab and the teams from l'Administrateur Général des Données.
<strong>Contribution de données</strong>: Contribute through data: access to up-to-date and quality datasets is what makes {{productName}}'s algorithms clever. We use, among others, anonymized data given by Pôle emploi about job seekers routes, training data from CARIF-OREFs network, and several APIs such as LaBonneBoîte's (companies that might be hiring) or MultiPosting's (translation from job names to ROME codes).
<strong>Contribution de services</strong: Contribute through services: developing the application has been generously helped by some companies such as <3>Ferpection (for user testing), <6>ZenDesk (for support), <9>Lucca (for HR), among others, who offered their services free of charge.
Accompagner sur plus de types de projets: Coach different kind of projects (reconversion, creating a company, …)
Accéder à plus d'informations sur le mar: See more info on employment market
Affiner les recommandations en fonction: Refine recommendations according to jobs and situations
Alors que les déplacements et rencontres: At a time when travel and physical encounters between people are being drastically reduced, it seems all the more important to us that new technologies should contribute to social cohesion, and continue to help those who need them to move forward in their job search. {{productName}}, therefore, remains fully operational during the containment measures.
Analyse du marché du travail dans votre: Analysing employment market in your region
Autour de quelle ville cherchez-vous ?: Around which city are you searching for a job?
Autre canal (réponse à une offre, concou: Other channel (answering a job offer, contest, conference, ...)
Avant de fonder Bayes Impact en 2014, Pa: Before founding Bayes Impact in 2014, Paul was formerly a Data Scientist at Eventbrite, where he wrote algorithms and terrible jokes (he still does). He studied a weird mixture of mathematics, economics and political science at UC Berkeley, Sciences Po and the Sorbonne.

becomes easier!

Bien qu'il soit impossible de se rencont: Although it is not possible to meet in person, I am available for a video conference interview, for example via the site http://itshello.co/ which allows you to do an interview directly from your browser. If we can find a time slot to meet, I will send you a login link for our appointment.
Bien que la France soit à l'arrêt, votre: Although France is at a standstill, your company remains active and its mission is still as important as ever. Thinking about the future of your teams is necessary, that's why I'm contacting you for a position of (...)

Ce temps où l'économie fonctionne au ral: This period when the economy is idling can be an opportunity to take online training or simply a course. Why not explore this area that has always intrigued you? For example, you can take computer training courses on <1>OpenClassrooms</1>, or take courses on <3>Coursera</3>, <5>France Université Numérique</5>, or <7>Khan Academy</7>. Some of the courses available on your <9>Compte personnel de formation</9> (France's Individual Learning Account scheme) can also be done online.
Cela ne prendra qu'entre <1>2</1> et<3>: It will only take between <1>2</1> and<3> 5 minutes</3> and will let me understand what you're after.

Cyrille a fait de la recherche en mathém: Cyrille was doing research in mathematics until he realised it didn't make much sense in real life and decided to make himself useful. He likes board games, especially the cooperating kind, and to go hiking or rock climbing when the weather allows it.
Dans certains cas, nous utilisons aussi: In some cases, we also use cookies from third-party applications like Amplitude. Those analytics services provide us with data about how you browse our application, that allows us to improve our content.
Dans le but de nous souvenir de vos préf: In order to remember your preferences and improve your experience, we need to use cookies. The information stored in those cookies allow us to retrieve your info each time you interact with a page.
Dans toutes vos communications \"emploi\: In all your "work" communications: spontaneous application, cover letter, follow-up email, it is important to personalize each message to have a better chance of reaching the recipient. In these extraordinary times, it is just as important to adapt your speech and wording by taking into account both the general situation and the situation of your interlocutor. Don't hesitate to learn about the situation of the company you are applying to by monitoring its social networks and possible communications concerning the continuation of its activities during the period of confinement.
Dans un monde qui va très vite et où l'o: In a fast-paced world where you are often pushed to apply more and more, faster and faster, confinement can be an opportunity to slow down and take stock.
Depuis combien de temps avez-vous commen: How long ago did you start your job search?
How long ago did you start applying for this job?
Depuis qu'il est enfant John est absolum: Since his childhood, John has been passionate about design and interfaces. He started to design at the age of 14 by making DVD covers and publishing them online. He is obsessed with symmetry, and it inspires him every day. As a true French, he obviously loves cheese and wine.

En poursuivant votre navigation sur ce s: By pursuing your visit on this website, you accept its use of cookies to improve the quality of the service and to compute visit statistics. Your data will not be given to third parties, nor used for commercial. <1>Learn more</1>

Faciliter la complémentarité avec les fo: Simplify working hand-in-hand with human coaches
Foncez vers votre futur emploi avec les: Head towards your future job with {{productName}}'s sharp advice to act on your best strategies.
Il est encore trop tôt pour évaluer comm: It is still too early to understand how the lockdown will affect recruiting in France and globally. {{productName}}'s advice is using statistics published monthly by Pôle emploi, and as such will adjust as the employment market is changing. However we are pursuing our research to understand what those changes mean for your case.
Il n'existe pas de « chercheur d'emploi: There's no "standard jobseeker": Making useful recommandations for a specific person requires to handle every aspect of their situation. The same goes for jobs: some advice that would be very useful for an accountant does not need to be for a carpenter! If our recommandations and our algorithms take these into account as of now, very specific recommandations require a more thorough job, creating content.
Intégrer les aides et règles administrat: Add more content about administrative rules and help
Intégrer les compétences et centres d'in: Take skills and centers of interest into account

Je suis <1>{{productName}}</1>, votre as: I am <1>{{productName}}</1>, your personal assistant to speed up your job search.
Je vais vous accompagner tout au long de: I will work with you during your whole job search project to help you make it happen fast.
Je vous recommande de commencer en douce: I suggest that you start easily with a casual coaching. This greatly increases your chances to find a job quickly. 😊
Joanna a étudié le français à Cambridge: Joanna studied French at Cambridge and has been addicted to France ever since. She likes accessibility design, podcasts with good stories, The London Review of Books, and she never says no to a cup of tea.
Jusqu'où êtes-vous prêt·e à vous déplace: How far are you ready to move?

La <1>Validation des acquis de l'expérie: <1>Experience acquired validation</1> (VAE in French), makes it possible under certain conditions to convert your experience into a certification.
La desinscription de {{productName}} sup:
Unsubscribing from {{productName}} will delete your entire data from our website.

Do you really want to continue?
La difficulté de <strong>rester motivé·e: The difficulty of staying motivated in my search
La plupart des navigateurs vous offrent: Most browsers have a feature that allows you to refuse the use of cookies. Please consult the "Tools" or "Help" section of your browser. Yet, disabling cookies could alter some features on this website or others. This is why we recommend that you do not disable them.
La recherche d'emploi n'est pas statique: Jobsearch is all but static: while the jobseeker goes along their search (including following their visit to {{productName}}!), their situation and needs evolve. How can we measure these changes, and give one a feeling of advancement, while adapting the recommendations accordingly?
La vocation de {{productName}} n'est pas: {{productName}}'s calling isn't to replace human coaching. On the contrary, it is an addition to it. While testing with users, we've had a glimpse of what can be done when both a digital coaching, which is always available albeit more superficial, and a human one, more refined but harder to put in place, work hand-in-hand. We've started on that track by allowing users to share their activity on {{productName}} to those they chose, but we wish to explore ever further how to improve the collaboration between them.
Laissez vide si vous n'avez pas d'idée p: Do not fill if you don't have a precise idea in mind
Le <strong>manque d'offres</strong>, cor: The lack of offers matching my criteria
Le <strong>manque de réponses</strong> d: The lack of answers from recruiters, even negative ones

Le saviez-vous ?! La concurrence en {{jo: Did you know?! Competition in {{jobGroupName}} {{inCity}} is {{toughCompetition}}, <8>{{yearlyAvgOffersPer10Candidates}} offer per 10 candidates</8>.
Did you know?! Competition in {{jobGroupName}} {{inCity}} is {{toughCompetition}}, <8>{{yearlyAvgOffersPer10Candidates}} offers per 10 candidates</8>.
Les cookies sont des fichiers stockés da: Cookies are files stored in your browser by the websites you are visiting. It's a common practice, shared among most websites. Our website uses cookies to improve your experience by remembering your preferences and by activating other features based on cookies (ex: analytics tools).
Lorsque vous soumettez des données via u: When you are submitting data through a form, such as contact forms or comment forms, cookies can be used to save some data about you for future use.

Nicolas a pu travailler dans différentes: Nicolas previously worked for several communication agencies, regarding digital reputation, crisis communication or media relations. Fascinated with cinema and French politic, he also loves to discover, and talk about, new restaurants.
Nombre d'entretiens décrochés 6 mois apr: Number of interviews obtained 6 months after the beginning of the jobsearch
Nombre d'entretiens décrochés un an aprè: Number of interviews obtained one year after the beginning of the jobsearch
Nos recommandations se font aujourd'hui: We make recommandations based on targetted jobs and how they are related. This allows us to make some suggestions, but cannot go very far by itself. We're working on other recommandations based on skills and centers of interest.
Notre objectif est de créer le service l: Our goal is to make the most useful service to help people looking for a job. This is a huge task and this is just a beginning: here are the different ways you could help us in our mission.
Notre équipe est déterminée<br/>à change:
Our Team is Determined
to Change the World
Nous avons aujourd'hui choisi de nous co: We chose to focus on looking for a position in a specific job, but jobsearches can be of very different natures. In particular, we'd like to have a better , nous souhaitons approfondir notre capacité à accompagner les personnes en reconversion professionnelle, ainsi que les personnes cherchant à créer leur activité. {{productName}} a été pensé de façon modulable, mais intégrer ces types de parcours requiert un travail conséquent de création de contenu et d'algorithmes de recommandation spécifiques.
Nous avons une petite faveur à vous dema: We would like to ask you a little something…
Nous ne sommes pas encore capable de vou:
We are not able to give you a complete analysis of your situation yet. Some pieces of information, especially on your job market, are not available in our databasae yet.

However, you can start looking at the indicators on the side.

To get an analysis of your profile, you can send us [a message]({{helpRequestUrl}}).

A member of the {{productName}} team will send you a personalized diagnostic.
Nous ne traitons pas encore bien la créa: We do not cover business creation properly yet
Nous ne traitons pas encore bien la reco: We do not cover professional reconversion properly yet
Nous pensons que personne ne devrait êtr: We believe that noone should be alone in their job search. This is why <1>{{productName}} is entirely free and non-profit.</1> Our mission is to share the information to enlighten the path of everyone. But we do not have the marketing budget of a business. To help as many people as possible, we need you.
Nous savons que certains points de ce pr: We know that some parts of that program won't be doable during the lockdown. <2>Find our tips</2> on making progress in your job search while staying home.
Nous sommes une association loi 1901 à b: We are a non-profit organization: {{productName}} is free and always will be.
Nous sommes une petite équipe convaincue:
We are a small team convinced that technology can be used for things that make sense, not only for profit.

This is why we have built <4>{{productName}} and created <7>Bayes Impact, a non-profit organization, to serve everyone.
Nous travaillons dur pour améliorer nos: We are working hard on implementing new features, but in the meantime here are several free resources that might be useful to you!

If you stop now, your progress will be lost and your data will be deleted… Moreover this is the most important strategy in your situation, it's too bad to stop now.
Si vous décidez de supprimer votre compt:
If you decide to delete your account, all your data will be permanently deleted, especially your profile, your projects and your completed actions. It will be impossible to restore them afterwards.

We are sad to see you go, please take the time to tell us what we should improve <4>by clicking here!
Si vous pensez que {{productName}} peut: If you thin that {{productName}} could help someone you know, please share this link with them:
Si vous pouvez lire cette page, vous ave: If you can read this page, you probably have access to the Internet and can do a lot of things online. Finding a job offer, preparing an application, sending a cover letter… all this can be done from home. Even job interviews can be done online these days! If this is new for you, {{productName}} can help you through the different stages of your job search while following the government's confinement rules.
Si vous souhaitez discuter de contributi: If you wish to talk about this kind of contribution, feel free to write to us at <1>contribuer@bob-emploi.fr</1>!
Si vous souhaitez partager des suggestio: If you have suggestions specific to your region you'd like to share with us you can <1>send them to us by clicking here</1>.
Si vous touchez l'allocation chômage de: If you are receiving unemployment benefits from Pôle emploi, they have cancelled all the compulsory meeting notifications and you will not be struck off for non-attendance. <1>Pôle emploi agents are mobilized</1> and are available by phone at 3949 or on their website.

{{productName}} a déjà aidé plus de <2>{: {{productName}} has already helped more than <2>{{userCount}} users</2> to have a better understanding of the jobsearch
{{productName}} est entièrement gratuit: {{productName}} is entirely free and non-profit. We aim to help as many people as possible, and that's why we need you! By sharing {{productName}} to someone for whom it could be useful, you help us make the world a better place, one step at a time - and it only takes a minute.
{{productName}} est rendu en partie poss: {{productName}} is possible in part thanks to external contributions
{{productName}} fonctionne en proposant: {{productName}} thrives to make the most personnalized recommendations possible to jobseekers, to help them in their jobsearch. Those recommandations are of two kinds: strategic solutions ("Have you thought about freelancing?") and simple and concrete actions to implement them ("Read this article on how to get ready to be freelance"). We've made more than 500 recommandations, thanks to jobseekers contribution, Pôle emploi counselors but also people from very all sort of backgrounds.
{{productName}} m'a incité à mobiliser m: {{productName}} encouraged me to reach to my network by providing me suitable tools. Actually, {{productName}} learned me how to be bold!
{{productName}} se concentre aujourd'hui: {{productName}} focuses currently mostly on finding a job.
{{productName}} vous explique comment ag: {{productName}} explains how to act on your employability with clear and tailor-made strategies. {{productName}} adapts according to your desires and your availability. You're the boss!
Éléments bloquants de votre recherche: Blocking elements of your job search

Êtes-vous sûr·e de vouloir arrêter ?: Are you sure you want to stop?
